```{python, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, results="asis", warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
sys.path.append('../../../assets/python')

from ctns_make import ctns_make as CTNS_MAKE
from ctns      import ctns as CTNS
```

```{python, eval=TRUE, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
target = [
    "QF-Circle"
  , "QF-Parabola"
  , "QF-QuadraticFormula"
  , "QF-QuadraticFunctionGeneralForm"
  , "QF-QuadraticFunctionVertexForm"
  , "QF-TheDiscriminant"
  , "QF-VertexOfAParabola"
]

print(CTNS_MAKE(target = target))
```

```{python, eval=TRUE, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

for p in target:
    print(CTNS(
        target = [ p ], 
        image_target = p,
        #write_file = False,
        write_image = False,
        skip_image = True,
        #action="ctns_make",
        opt_ctns = [
          "flashcard",
          "no_reference",
          "flush"
        ]))
```
